actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 23 (3d10+7) bludgeoning damage and the target must make DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Thunderous Bellow (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The thundercall hadrosaur unleashes a ground-shattering bellow in a 120' cone. All in area make a DC 16 Con save. On a failure a creature takes 38 (7d10) thunder and is knocked prone. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn't knocked prone.
